entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
